resources.string: 1.Battery Charging: Notifies when the device starts or stops charging.
2.Network Connections: Monitors changes in network type (e.g., switching from Wi-Fi to mobile data).
3.Airplane Mode: Indicates when airplane mode is enabled or disabled.
5.Wi-Fi Status: Tracks when Wi-Fi is connected, disconnected, or toggled.
6.Mobile Internet Status: Alerts when mobile data is turned on or off.
7.Screen Status: Informs about the screen turning on or off.
4.Bluetooth Status: Alerts when Bluetooth is turned on/off or connected/disconnected.
